text: Its a nice church eventhough its not a big church but i think they did a great job to establish an organized church..they are supporting CHARIS which is known for their action for helping people in need overseas..fr colin tan deliver a good message in his homily..make us feels very blessed after we going home

Yesterday first time visit,  attended mass( funeral mass)  lately noticed during communion (may her  soul  rest in peace) .   Church is nice, peaceful and elegant.  If your looking for adoration chapel, just follow the signage( exact location  backside/parking area). ALSO they have  a grotto area.  Will come back again.
A big church with wheelchair access, carpark and a well rehearsed choir. Easy access from Farrer Road circle line, and Empress market is 100meters away.

Beautiful Catholic Church around Bukit Timah. It offers a quiet place of contemplation and reflection. The car park lots are spacious too which is helpful. The Church facilities are all clean and modern. Appreciate that there are lifts at each level which makes it accessible for many people. They also have a columbarium at basement 1. God bless everyone. üôèüèª

The Church of St Ignatius is place of worship, prayers, reflections and singing which is neat to MRT station, residents and hawker. The main church hall has a very peaceful feeling. It has been a feeling of bliss that welcomes me each time I visit this place. The church has a lift near the main entrance. There is a small store but it has a wide variety of affordable reading materials. The church is meaningfully and richly decorated during Christmas season that will remind church - goers the true meaning of Advent season and Christmas day. Although the church is located near to posh houses of the "rich", the church is known to be very friendly and welcoming to migrants, domestic helpers and elderly.
